title: I keep disconnecting from the pvp.net server
body: Over the last 3 days every 30 or so seconds i disconnect from the pvp.net server. wither this is sitting on the home screen or in-game. I don't know what to do to fix this. I have tried reinstalling the game, restarting my PC, seeing if i have virus on my PC, repairing the client, restarting my internet, and tried playing or wifi and LAN. I have good internet that isn't the problem. Does anyone have any solutions that can help me fix this problem as i filed a support report to riot and haven't heard back form them

replies.body:
Since you've already submitted a support ticket, I recommend waiting for a tech specialist to get back to you, as they'll have more context with the logs you've provided. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
